favorites.original_title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
favorites.overview: Following their explosive showdown, Godzilla and Kong must reunite against a colossal undiscovered threat hidden within our world, challenging their very existence – and our own.
favorites.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire

favorites.overview: Po is gearing up to become the spiritual leader of his Valley of Peace, but also needs someone to take his place as Dragon Warrior. As such, he will train a new kung fu practitioner for the spot and will encounter a villain called the Chameleon who conjures villains from the past.
favorites.title: Kung Fu Panda 4

favorites.overview: Ex-UFC fighter Dalton takes a job as a bouncer at a Florida Keys roadhouse, only to discover that this paradise is not all it seems.
favorites.title: Road House

favorites.original_title: アイドルマスター　ミリオンライブ！　第1幕
favorites.title: アイドルマスター　ミリオンライブ！　第1幕

favorites.overview: Forced to confront revelations about her past, paramedic Cassandra Webb forges a relationship with three young women destined for powerful futures...if they can all survive a deadly present.
favorites.title: Madame Web
